greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,m) read by rows: T(n,m)= A013609(n,m) if m <= n/2, T(n,m)= T(n,n-m) otherwise.
example: T(n,m) = 2^m*binomial(n,m) if 0 <= m <= n/2, T(n,m)= 2^(n-m)*binomial(n,m) if n/2 <= m <= n.
mathematica: Clear[f, t]; f[n_, m_] = If[m <= Floor[n/2], m, n - m]; t[n_, m_] = Binomial[n, m]*2^f[n, m]; Table[Table[t[n, m], {m, 0, n}], {n, 0, 10}]; Flatten[%]
results.author: _Roger L. Bagula_ and _Gary W. Adamson_, Oct 09 2008
ext: Offset corrected, keyword:tabl inserted by the Assoc. Eds. of the OEIS, Jun 30 2010
